title: Three-Bedroom Apartment with a Wrap-Around Patio or Deck
posting_body: ['Villas at Sunrise Mountain', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x782', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', '3 \xa0bedroom 2 bath 1208Sq.', 'Ft.  From $1,725/mo', '* Unit 1036 - Available 08/11/22', '* Unit 2028 - Available 08/15/22', '* Unit 1025 - Available 09/11/22', '* Unit 2045 - Available 09/13/22', 'Exceptional Location, Remarkable Value', 'Villas at Sunrise Mountain is a pet-friendly community in southeast Las Vegas offering you this luxe three-bedroom, two-bathroom floor plan for lease.', 'The open-concept layout showcases a chef’s island in the kitchen, access to a wrap-around patio in the living room, and a large walk-in closet in the master bedroom.', 'By being a resident, Villas at Sunrise Mountain gives you exclusive access to on-site conveniences such as a detached garage, a business center, and a relaxing spa.', 'Visit now.', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:', '* Offering 1-, 2-, and 3- Bedroom Apartments', '* Roommate Style Floor Plans Available*', '* Enjoy Majestic Views of Las Vegas', '* Upgraded Interiors*', '* Hardwood Flooring', '* Breakfast Bars', '* Walk-In Closets', '* 9-Foot Ceilings', '* Washer', '* Air Conditioning', '* Private Patio', '* One Assigned Parking Space', '* Rentable Garages Available', '* *Available in Select Apartments', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* Pool', '* Gate', '* Fitness Center', '* Business Center', '* Picnic Area', '* Gas Grills', '* Clubhouse', '* Night Patrol', '* Garage', '* On-site Maintenance', '* On-site Management', 'MANAGED BY:', 'ConAm Management', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x782', 'Address:', '6360 E Sahara Ave Las Vegas, NV 89142', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
